body.name: Similac 360 Total Care Infant Formula, with 5 HMO Prebiotics, Our Closest Formula to Breast Milk, Non-GMO, Baby Formula, Ready-to-Feed, 8 Fl Oz (Pack of 24)
features: EASY TO DIGEST: Similac Advance is nutritionally complete and inspired by breast milk
SUPPORTS BRAIN & EYES: Has DHA and lutein, important ingredients found in breast milk
NO PALM OLEIN OIL: Designed to support excellent calcium absorption
NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES : Similac was the first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormones. Similac Advance is also kosher and halal
SIMILAC IS THE #1 INFANT FORMULA BRAND FED IN HOSPITALS

ELECTRONIC BENEFITS TRANSFER (EBT) ELIGIBLE: Eligible to be purchased with Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefits in select stores. The SNAP name is a service mark of the US Department of Agriculture; USDA does not endorse any goods, services, or enterprises
body.description: Similac 360 Total Care Infant Formula contains the closest prebiotic blend to breast milk. It’s made with 5 HMOs, a prebiotic blend previously only available in breast milk, and has the highest level of HMOs compared to any other leading infant formula brand. Our formula also has nutrition designed for immune support, brain development, and digestive health. Contains no artificial growth hormones‡ and is non-GMO.§ * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. † Total US infant formula, all outlets as of 6/2020, Nielsen data. ‡ No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows. § Ingredients not genetically engineered.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: First & Only Infant Formula With 5 HMOs Similac 360 Total Care* is the first and only infant formula with a blend of 5 HMOs, our closest prebiotic blend to that in breast milk, and is designed to provide 360 total nutrition to support your baby’s health and development. * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. Immune Support Similac 360 Total Care is designed to help strengthen baby’s immune system. Brain Development Similac 360 Total Care has building blocks for your baby’s developing brain. Digestive Health HMOs feed good bacteria in baby’s gut, where 70% of the immune system exists.

No Palm Olein Oil Formulas with no palm olein oil have been shown to promote softer stools for your baby, more like breastfed infants. And our no palm olein oil fat blend allows for excellent calcium absorption for strong bones. Available in a 3 pack Save up to 15% with Subscribe & Save. MySimilac Rewards With MySimilac Rewards, get nutrition guidance for you and baby, exclusive benefits, coupons, and much more. Feeding Resources No matter how you choose to feed your baby, Similac is here to support your journey. The Similac Feeding Expert team can provide nutrition support and feeding advice when you need it.

Similac 360 Total Care* Similac 360 Total Care Sensitive* Similac Pro-Total Comfort* Complete Nutrition for Infants ✓ ✓ ✓ Has a blend of DHA, Lutein, and Vitamin E ✓ ✓ ✓ 5-HMO Prebiotic Blend including 2'-FL HMO ✓ ✓ Our Closest to Breast Milk ✓ For Fussiness & Gas Due to Lactose Sensitivity ✓ ✓ Partially Hydrolyzed Whey Protein for Easy Digestion ✓ *Not for infants or children with galactosemia. ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure to hit subscribe and save!
reviews.reviewText: Similac 360 Total Care Infant Formula offers a convenient and reliable option for parents seeking a formula that closely mimics breast milk. Packed with 5 HMO prebiotics, it promotes healthy digestion and supports the baby's immune system. The non-GMO formula provides peace of mind for parents concerned about ingredients. The ready-to-feed design saves time and hassle, making it an excellent choice for busy parents. With the option to subscribe and save, Similac 360 Total Care ensures a consistent supply, adding an extra layer of convenience for parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient, perfect size.
reviews.reviewText: The hospital used this brand of formula, and we’ve been using this to supplement the breast milk as our newborn has been a voracious eater hahaha.Just be sure to follow the instructions and precautions to the letter.I love this way better than the powder, as the liquid is already sterile from the factory. It takes time to sterilize your own water, and mix it with the powder. This is instantaneous and saved us valuable time for our own nap times haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sliced open bottle...
reviews.reviewText: I've ordered a few cases of this since having a baby 2 months ago. I like the price and the size was convenient. However I recently opened a case only to find 1 of the bottles in a six pack completely sliced open at the neck of the bottle. The cardboard box showed no signs of a leak and the product seemed well packed. I actually cannot figure out how it shipped without leaking everywhere?? Almost as if the packaging held it together just tightly enough. Luckily it was only one bottle... only out about $3... Hopefully it doesn't keep happening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it when on sale!
reviews.reviewText: Premade formula is great especially for late nights or traveling when making a powder bottle isn’t very convenient. Much more costly than powder but not too bad when on sale for this 24 pack. Baby seems to love it just as much as the powder!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what it says it is. Came quickly and was packaged great. No issues in transport, all bottles were perfectly fine and usable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great price compared to the store price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy and quick way to feed your baby
reviews.reviewText: Similac was recommended to my new born baby by the doctor .it's safe and good and a ready milk to feed your baby immediately. The only thing which I faced as a problem was that if you open a bottle you have to use it with in 1 hour . new born babies can't finish milk in one go and take time to finish .so you have to throw the milk left in a bottle but actually if you keep it in cooler .it stays good for an hour or two .so my 100% recommendation for this milk to all new moms .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Similac 360 Total Care Infant Formula,
reviews.reviewText: Oh, the Similac 360 Total Care Infant Formula! It's a great choice for your little one. It's specially formulated with 5 HMO prebiotics to support your baby's immune system. Plus, it's designed to be as close as possible to breast milk, providing your baby with the essential nutrients they need. And the fact that it's ready-to-feed makes it super convenient for busy parents like you. It's definitely a reliable option! 👶🍼😊
